summary: Implements the UPnP/SSDP discovery mechanism for the emulated Hue integration, exposing a description XML via an HTTP view and running a background listener that replies to discovery probes so Home Assistant can be recognized as a Hue bridge.
business_intent: Enable third‑party smart‑home devices to discover and interact with Home Assistant as if it were a Philips Hue hub, facilitating seamless integration and control.
